works.name: Akash Folio
works.desc: This portfolio website is a visually stunning and interactive showcase built using React, Three.js, React Three Fiber (R3F), Drei, Aceternity UI, and React Bit for seamless 3D component integration. It features dynamic 3D elements, smooth animations, and an intuitive UI, offering an immersive experience. The site highlights my projects, skills, and achievements in a modern and engaging way.
works.smallDesc: 3D portfolio site with immersive visuals and smooth animations. Built using R3F & Drei.

works.name: Nestingo
works.desc: Nestingo is a comprehensive PG (Paying Guest) accommodation booking platform that revolutionizes the way students and working professionals find rental housing. The platform connects verified property owners with tenants, offering zero brokerage fees and transparent pricing. Features include advanced search filters, virtual property tours, secure payment processing, tenant-landlord communication portal, and 24/7 customer support. Users can browse through hundreds of verified PG accommodations with detailed amenities, photos, and genuine reviews from previous tenants.
works.smallDesc: Zero-brokerage PG booking platform connecting students & professionals with verified accommodations nationwide.

works.name: Gagan Codes
works.desc: Gagan Codes is a cutting-edge portfolio website that showcases innovative web development with immersive 3D experiences. Built using Next.js for optimal performance and SEO, the platform features stunning Three.js 3D visualizations powered by React Three Fiber (R3F) and Drei for enhanced 3D capabilities. The website demonstrates modern web development practices with smooth animations, responsive design using Tailwind CSS, and interactive motion effects. The portfolio highlights expertise in full-stack development, 3D web graphics, and creating engaging user experiences that push the boundaries of web technology.
works.smallDesc: Immersive 3D portfolio website showcasing modern web development with Three.js and React Three Fiber.

works.name: VR Multiservices
works.desc: VR Multiservices is a premier event management platform that crafts unforgettable experiences and creates lasting brand impact. Specializing in corporate gatherings, exhibitions, brand activations, and roadshows, the platform offers comprehensive event planning solutions with strategic execution. Features include event portfolio showcase, client testimonial system, customized branding materials catalog (boards, stands, promotional items), vendor management dashboard, and ROI tracking analytics. The platform connects event organizers with clients while providing end-to-end project management tools, budget calculators, timeline tracking, and real-time collaboration features to ensure flawless event execution.
works.smallDesc: Premier event management platform creating unforgettable experiences through strategic planning & custom branding solutions.

works.name: WalkBuy
works.desc: A revolutionary local shopping platform that bridges the gap between traditional street shops and modern digital commerce. WalkBuy enables customers to discover, browse, and preview products from nearby local businesses through an intuitive mobile app, while providing shop owners with WalkShop - a simple showcase management system. The platform promotes local economy by allowing users to search for shops, products, and offers in their vicinity, preview items digitally, then visit the physical store for personal consultation, fitting, and purchase. Features real-time inventory updates, location-based discovery, merchant dashboard, customer reviews, and seamless integration between online browsing and offline shopping experience.
works.smallDesc: Discover and shop local products digitally. Bridging offline stores with online visibility.

works.name: Prodigy
works.desc: A professional football coaching platform that bridges the gap between grassroots and elite level training. The website features dynamic booking systems for private sessions, team coaching programs, and high-performance academies. Built with modern web technologies to provide seamless user experience for players, coaches, and clubs across Australia. Includes real-time scheduling, payment processing, progress tracking, and interactive training modules designed to develop well-rounded and intelligent community footballers through specialized coaching methodologies.
works.smallDesc: Football coaching platform with bookings, payments, and training modules for all levels.

works.name: Solar System
works.desc: The Solar System project is an interactive 3D visualization of our solar system, developed using React, React Three Fiber (R3F), Three.js, and Drei. This application offers users an immersive experience, allowing them to explore the planets and their orbits in a visually appealing manner.
works.smallDesc: Explore a 3D solar system in your browser. Built with React Three Fiber and Drei.

works.name: Anipedia
works.desc: AniPedia is a web application designed for anime enthusiasts, offering up-to-date information on currently airing anime and top performers. Leveraging the Jikan API, it provides detailed insights into various anime series. Users can search for specific anime, watch trailers via YouTube, and find platforms where they can stream their chosen series.
works.smallDesc: Discover trending anime with trailers, ratings & stream links. Powered by Jikan API.
